summary: This document is an index of materials produced by the law firm BSF in response to a grand jury subpoena in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell. It lists numerous depositions, exhibits, and hearing transcripts from 2015-2019, revealing the extensive discovery process involving key figures, associates, and experts.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Central defendant in the case; her depositions from April and July 2016 are listed among the discovery materials.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named in a deposition from September 2016; his testimony is part of the designated materials.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Attorney whose designated testimony from October 2015 and January 2016 is listed in the discovery index.

persons.name: Dr. Steven Olson
persons.context: Gave a deposition on May 26, 2016, with associated exhibits and designated testimony.

persons.name: David Rodgers
persons.context: Gave a deposition on June 3, 2016, with associated exhibits and designated testimony.

persons.name: James Austrich
persons.context: Gave a deposition on June 23, 2016, with associated exhibits and designated testimony.

persons.name: Ross Gow
persons.context: Gave a deposition on November 18, 2016, with associated exhibits and designated testimony.

persons.name: Bernard Jansen
persons.context: Gave a deposition on November 9, 2016, with associated exhibits.

persons.name: Gilbert Kliman
persons.context: Gave a deposition on November 17, 2016, with associated exhibits.

persons.name: Terry Coonan
persons.context: Gave a deposition on November 21, 2016, with associated exhibits.

persons.name: Phillip Esplin
persons.context: Gave a deposition on December 1, 2016, with associated exhibits and designated testimony.

persons.name: Gregory Taylor
persons.context: Gave a deposition on December 2, 2016, with associated exhibits.

persons.name: Judge Sweet
persons.context: Presided over sealed conference hearings in 2016 and 2017, as noted in the hearing transcripts section.

connections.description: Both are central figures in the case, with Maxwell's and Epstein's depositions being key parts of the discovery materials.
Dershowitz's designated testimony is part of the discovery in Maxwell's case, indicating a legal or testimonial connection.
Dershowitz's designated testimony is listed in the context of discovery materials that also include Epstein's deposition.

events.title: Deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: First listed deposition of defendant Ghislaine Maxwell, with numerous exhibits.

events.description: Deposition of Jeffrey Epstein, with exhibits and designated testimony.

events.title: Sealed Grand Jury Subpoena Order

events.title: Sealed Conference Hearing
events.description: Sealed hearing before Judge Sweet, transcript is part of the filed materials.

keyFacts: The document is an index of materials produced in response to a 2019 grand jury subpoena related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case, indicating an active investigation.
It reveals a vast discovery process including depositions from Maxwell (twice in 2016) and Jeffrey Epstein (once in 2016).
Designated testimony from attorney Alan Dershowitz from 2015 and 2016 is included in the materials.
The index lists numerous other depositions from witnesses and experts like Dr. Steven Olson, David Rodgers, and Ross Gow.
The materials were loaded to a ShareFile system in April 2019, shortly after the sealed grand jury order was issued.
